body:
Hi Khalod, hi Rob,


 


had to do some work away from home, so it took some time.


I had no success on the OSX platform. Also 0.9.4 doesn´t change anything.


 


The run stops very fast with the following messages in stdout:


 


?ruby -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/1.8? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/powerpc-darwin12.0? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/universal-darwin12.0? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/vendor_ruby/1.8? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/vendor_ruby/1.8/universal-darwin12.0? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/vendor_ruby? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/1.8? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/1.8/powerpc-darwin12.0? -I ?/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/lib/ruby/1.8/universal-darwin12.0? -I ?.? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/openstudio? -I ?/Library/Ruby/Site/lib?  ?./ModelToRad.rb? ?/private/var/folders/30/8y6hrx_12fs91f5ls6rs38dw0000gn/T/qt_temp.JpW419/resources/run/0-Ruby/in.osm? ???


no sql file given, running EnergyPlus...


Looking for EnergyPlus at /Applications/EnergyPlus-7-1-0


Found EnergyPlus.


 


failed to run ModelToRad


 


 


Stderr tells the following:


 


./ModelToRad.rb:166:in `create?: Unable to locate file in search paths (RuntimeError)


from ./ModelToRad.rb:166


 


On the other hand I had success with Windows 7. No problems with installation and run radiance within OpenStudio (I will go on testing with the command line tools).


 


As my final target will be OSX, I still appreciate any idea concerning my problem.


 


Many thanks and best regards


Martin
